page.title: 02Government, Murroes
page.content: At national level this area is included in the{Angus East } constituency which is at present represented in Parliament by Mr. Peter Fraser. As well as being a Conservative M.P., Mr. Fraser is {Solicitor General for Scotland.} At local level the area is represented on Tayside Regional Council by Mrs. Jane Hendry, and on Dundee District Council by Mr. Alan Grewar. Though the{Community Council}has no powers of government, it plays an important role in conveying the needs and opinions of local people to the Regional and District Councillors. A survey conducted by the pupils showed that many people wished the Community Council to have more power.
